name: Twin Shooters
description:
Twin shooters is a 2 player cooperative endless runner! Take out enemies, destroy walls and be careful not to shoot at your own teammates! 

Credits:

Jihong Min - Art/Programming

Krishna Thiruvengadam - Programming

Christian Gayle - Design/Programming
